column5: I am right in the middle of finishing up an old boat trailer to make use of it this year.  I am in need of a couple square u-bolts but i'm having trouble finding them.  I tried the big name stores (Canadian Tire, Rona, Home Depot, Home Hardware) but they all have like 3 different sizes, none of which will work for me.  Anyone know of a specific store in my area (Waterloo) or the types of stores that tend to carry these things?  I'd have to check the measurements again but I think i'm looking for one that is 3 inches wide and 5 inches long, and is 1/4 diameter.  Any help is much appreciated.  Thanks! Evan
Try mcmaster.com. They have about everything. Quick delivery also.
Try Spaneur on Victoria St, near the Parkway exit.  They had a showroom/warehouse last time I was in there. Spaneur
Make them Threaded rod in a vice
Princess Auto also carries them, or, any large truck shop can make them for you in 10 minutes..
You'll find what you want here for sure!  The U-Bolt     Connection Inc. Unit A, 105 Northland Rd Waterloo, Ontario N2V 1Y8 Tel: 519-746-6272 Fax: 519-746-5979    http://www.ubolt.com/orderdes.htm

Roy, I found that link a few minutes after I posted this topic.  Not sure how I missed that when I did my search...must need more coffee today or something.  I have an email in to them, we'll see what they come back with.
